title: BRIEF-Evolis Q3 revenue up 31 pct at 19.6 mln euros
text:
BRIEF-Evolis Q3 revenue up 31 pct at 19.6 mln euros 
Oct 8 Evolis SA : 
* Q3 revenue 19.6 million euros ($22.11 million) versus 15.0 million euros a year ago 
* Confirms FY guidance of 25 pct consolidated growth Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8864 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
